string.name: onboarding_get_started
string.translation_description: The label for the button to start using the app.

string.name: onboarding_welcome_to_google_i_o
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown at the onboarding screen of the app.

string.name: onboarding_date_location
string.translation_description: The date and the place of Google I/O 2019. [CHAR_LIMIT=80]

string.name: onboarding_label_days
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of days until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_hours
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_mins
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of minutes until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_seconds
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of seconds until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_pre
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown before the conference to tell that Google I/O is coming

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_during
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown during the conference

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_post
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown post the conference

resources.string: Watch the I/O \'19 recap and check out #io19 on social

string.name: onboarding_signin
string.translation_description: The welcome message to encourage the user to sign-in to have better experience

resources.string: Sign-in to receive I/O notifications and attendees can reserve seats for sessions.
